summary: Add dashboard routes to frontend router configuration in frontend/src/App.tsx without modifying existing routes/components.
architectural_notes: Router structure must not be refactored; only append new routes inside routeTree = rootRoute.addChildren([...]).
Do not modify existing routes/imports/components; add imports only if missing and register routes to prevent 404.

existing_features.title: Update `frontend/src/App.tsx` to register new TanStack Router routes for the existing dashboard pages, without changing or removing any existing routes, router structure, or other code. Add the new routes only by (1) adding imports if missing and (2) adding new `createRoute({ ... })` definitions, and (3) appending the new route variables into `routeTree = rootRoute.addChildren([ ... ])`.

Add routes with the exact paths below, each mapping to the existing dashboard component (default export) from the corresponding file:
- `/superadmin/dashboard` -> `SuperadminDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/superadmin/SuperadminDashboard.tsx`
- `/admin/dashboard` -> `AdminDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboard.tsx`
- `/asistenmu/dashboard` -> `AsistenmuDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/asistenmu/AsistenmuDashboard.tsx`
- `/concierge/dashboard` -> `ConciergeDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/concierge/ConciergeDashboard.tsx`
- `/strategicpartner/dashboard` -> `StrategicPartnerDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/strategicpartner/StrategicPartnerDashboard.tsx`
- `/management/dashboard` -> `ManagementDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/management/ManagementDashboard.tsx`
- `/finance/dashboard` -> `FinanceDashboard` from `frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceDashboard.tsx`

If a component is already imported in `App.tsx`, do not modify that import; if it is not imported, add an import line only (no other import changes).

new_feature_requests.summary: Register new dashboard routes in frontend/src/App.tsx for /superadmin/dashboard, /admin/dashboard, /asistenmu/dashboard, /concierge/dashboard, /strategicpartner/dashboard, /management/dashboard, /finance/dashboard using existing dashboard components (import if missing only)

projectName: Register internal dashboard routes in frontend/src/App.tsx (no refactors)
